author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's launch likely isn't going the way Activision would have hoped, at least in Europe. Via The Game Business, the European launch of the game saw 63% fewer copies sold compared to competitor Battlefield 6. It's also down more than 50% against last year's Black Ops 6. Game Pass subscriptions have not been taken into account as Microsoft has not provided that data. In other news, Charlie Cox doesn't want any of the credit for his performance as Gustave in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, even as he's nominated at this year's The Game Awards. Cox would prefer the accolades go to mo-cap artist Maxence Cazorla. And finally, despite what the internet is saying, Naughty Dog's Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet very likely won't be out in 2026, and probably won't have presence at The Game Awards next month, either.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's European Launch Was 'Terrible,' According to Anayst - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the LISA Season 12 Icon Trailer for Fortnite Festival, the rhythmic action music game within Fortnite developed by Harmonix and Epic Games. Players can enjoy specific songs and content from the global superstar LISA, who's the next Fortnite Festival Icon. LISA takes the Fortnite Festival stage on November 29.
title: Fortnite Festival - Official LISA Season 12 Icon Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get another look at gameplay from Floralis in this latest trailer for the upcoming cinematic puzzle adventure with horror elements. You are born from a tree in a post-human world ruled by sentient plants. Hide from predators, reawaken machines, and outwit living traps as you search for your twin and the truth of your birth. Floralis will be available on PC and Xbox Series X|S. An updated demo is out now on Steam.
title: Floralis - Official Gameplay Trailer #2

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Fatal Fury trailer as the fighting game series celebrates its 34th anniversary. The new trailer takes you through the fighting game's history, with highlights from the first game release in 1991, all the way through the latest entry released in 2025 with Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves.
title: Fatal Fury - Official 34th Anniversary Celebration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 trailer to see what's coming with Season 1, which brings 6 more multiplayer maps, a round-based Zombies map and two Survival experiences, and endgame world events, along with an arsenal of 7 weapons, weekly challenges, and more. Season 1 of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 begins on December 4, 2025.

#CallOfDutyBlackOps7 #Season1 #Gaming
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official Season 1 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
"The Hero's Journey starts with one squish." Watch The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants clip for this upcoming animated film as SpongeBob encounters The Flying Dutchman, and we meet SpongeBob's lucky brick. The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants stars Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown, Rodger Bumpass, Bill Fagerbakke, Carolyn Lawrence, Mr. Lawrence, George Lopez, Isis “Ice Spice” Gaston, Arturo Castro, Sherry Cola with Regina Hall and Mark Hamill. 

SpongeBob and his Bikini Bottom friends set sail in their biggest, all-new, can’t miss cinematic event ever…The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants. Desperate to be a big guy, SpongeBob sets out to prove his bravery to Mr. Krabs by following The Flying Dutchman – a mysterious swashbuckling ghost pirate – on a seafaring comedy-adventure that takes him to the deepest depths of the deep sea, where no Sponge has gone before.

The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants is executive produced by Marc Ceccarelli, Vincent Waller, Pete Chiapp
title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants - Official 'Hero's Journey' Clip (2025) Tom Kenny

author: IGN
description:
Escape from Ever After gets a new trailer showcasing its world, gameplay, and more, along with a release date announcement. Watch the latest Escape from Ever After trailer for this upcoming RPG inspired by the classic Paper Mario games. When a greedy megacorp from the real world starts taking over fairytales for their cheap labor, a newly-hired storybook hero must climb the corporate ladder, rally together other disgruntled employees, and fight back. Escape from Ever After will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on January 23, 2026.

#EscapeFromEverAfter #Gaming #IGN
title: Escape from Ever After - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Demo Launch Trailer for There Are No Ghosts At The Grand, a first-person action-adventure, psychological narrative-driven game developed by Friday Sundae. Players will work to restore a peaceful English hotel by day, and encounter the sinister and supernatural elements by night. Meet a variety of characters and uncover a deep plot with a musical flair to the mystery at hand. There Are No Ghosts At The Grand is launching in 2026 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam and Xbox PC), with a demo available now.
title: There Are No Ghosts At The Grand - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive is available now on Xbox PC and Steam, and it is coming to Xbox Series X/S and PlayStation 5 (PS5) in 2026. Watch the Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive launch trailer for this action RPG to see gameplay and more.

#IGN #gaming

description:
Check out the Attack on Titan Collab Teaser Trailer for Assassin's Creed Shadows, the hit third-person action-adventure RPG developed by Ubisoft. Get a glimpse at the upcoming Attack on Titan quest that tasks players to head into the enigmatic Crystal Cave, where a terrifying experiment may unleash a monstrous enemy. The Attack on Titan Collab quest for Assassin's Creed Shadows is launching on November 25 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#AssassinsCreedShadows #AttackOnTitan #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Collaboration Characters Overview Trailer for Sword of Convallaria, a free-to-play turn-based tactical strategy game developed by XD. Players can get the rundown on all of the new characters being added to the game as part of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt collaboration with Geralt of Rivia, Yennefer of Vengerberg, Triss, and Ciri. Learn each character's abilities and tactics in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Collaboration for Sword of Convallaria, running from November 28 through January 22, 2026, for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).

#SwordOfConvallaria #TheWitcher3WildHunt #Gaming
title: Sword of Convallaria x The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Official Collaboration Characters Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Experience the first 37 minutes of STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl running on PlayStation 5 Pro in Performance Mode, captured in crisp 4K. This opening gameplay showcases the atmospheric world, survival mechanics, and eerie tension that define GSC Game World’s long-awaited sequel. From the unsettling quiet of the Zone to your first encounters with anomalies and mutants, this is a quick look at how Stalker 2 performs on Sony’s upgraded hardware.

00:00 – Opening Cutscene
05:54 – Night Gameplay
21:07 – Day Gameplay

#Stalker2HeartOfChornobyl #Gaming #IGN
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - First 37 Minutes of PS5 Pro Gameplay (Captured in 4K)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Free Trial Week Trailer for Battlefield 6, the hit first-person action multiplayer game developed by DICE, EA, and Battlefield Studios. For one week only, players can try the latest Battlefield experience for free with Battlefield 6. Access three maps across four modes to get into the action of Battlefield 6's Free Trial, running from November 25 through December 2 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Battlefield6 #Gaming #IGN
title: Battlefield 6 - Official Free Trial Week Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Embark on New Adventures' Trailer for PlayStation VR2, the latest VR offering for PlayStation 5, developed by Sony. Players can dive into a suite of different PS VR2 games, such as Aces of Thunder, Reach, Dreams of Another, Lumines Arise, and more to step into the games you play in virtual reality. PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2) is available now.

#PSVR2 #Gaming #IGN

author: IGN
description:
Meet the Super Heroes of Marvel Cosmic Invasion in this opening animation trailer for the upcoming arcade-style tag team beat 'em up game. The trailer shows the roster of 15 playable characters, including Captain America, She-Hulk, Rocket Raccoon, Wolverine, Spider-Man, Storm, Phyla-Vell, Venom, Nova, Black Panther, Beta Ray Bill, Cosmic Ghost Rider, Silver Surfer, Phoenix, and Invincible Iron Man. Marvel Cosmic Invasion will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on December 1, 2025.

#MarvelCosmicInvasion #Gaming #IGN
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - Official Opening Animation Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch a Warhammer 40,000 principal narrative designer and writer breakdown the history of Warhammer video games! From 1993, with Space Hulk, to the iconic PlayStation 2 classic, 40K Fire Warrior, the Dawn of War series, Space Marine, Total War: Warhammer, and more!

From 1993 to 2024, the grimdark future is playable in all sorts of ways, and we've got Andy Hall, author of The Art of Warhammer Video Games, lead writer on the Total War: Warhammer series, and all-around 40K lore master, to break down the history of Warhammer 40K games. In our Warhammer timeline explained, what video game is your favourite out of the bunch?

#Warhammer #Warhammer40K #40K

00:00 - Intro
00:36 - Space Hulk
02:33 - Warhammer: Shadow of the Horned Rat & Dark Omen
03:54 - Final Liberation: Warhammer Epic 40,000
05:17 - Warhammer 40,000: Fire Warrior
06:56 - Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Series
09:38 - Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning
11:24 - Warhammer: End Times – Vermintide
12:49 - Warhammer 40,000: Darktid
title: Warhammer Writer Breaks Down the History of Warhammer Video Games

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Australia Did It in this latest trailer for the upcoming tactical reverse bullet hell. Learn about what you can expect from this game that blends turn-based tower defense strategy and reverse bullet hell combat. Australia Did It will be available on PC via Steam in 2026. A public playtest will be available in December 2025, and sign-ups for the free playtest are available now via Steam.

In Australia Did It, you’ll need to defend a cargo train with hired mercenaries as it navigates through the Atlantic Ocean seabed, drained and monster-ridden following a mysterious catastrophic event. Your mission? Escort precious cargo across hostile terrain by holding off endless waves of enemies at every station. If the shipment arrives intact, we’ll call it a win – whether you survive or not!

#AustraliaDidIt #Gaming #IGN
title: Australia Did It - Official HR Orientation Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Pioner gets a new trailer showing its post-apocalyptic world and an early access release date announcement. Watch the latest Pioner trailer for this post-apocalyptic MMO shooter game. Pioner will be available on Steam Early Access on December 16, 2025. Get ready to explore a vast, atmospheric, post-apocalyptic island, where remnants of the Soviet era create an incredible alternate reality.

#Pioner #Gaming #IGN

author: IGN
description: If this retro-themed on-rails sky shooter feels familiar, it's by design. Wild Blue Skies is being developed by Chuhai Labs, a team led by ex-Nintendo programmer Giles Goddard, who worked on Star Fox (oh, and also Super Mario 64!). In Wild Blue Skies, you play as pilot Bowie Stray as you engage in air combat above numerous biomes while battling the evil Grimclaw's forces. Wishlist Wild Blue Skies on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1921490/Wild_Blue/
title: Wild Blue Skies: Official Re-Reveal Gameplay Video

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Simpsons 'The Incredible Bulk' Trailer for Fortnite, the hit action third-person battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Players will get caught up on the narrative of the season as Homer consumes the Zero Point Shard, increasing his size and making him a giant. Encounter Giant Homer in the final battle of the season on November 29 for Fortnite.

#Fortnite #TheSimpsons #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
StarRupture gets a new trailer and a co-op playtest announcement. Check out the latest StarRupture trailer for this sci-fi open-world base-building survival game. The co-op playtest features an early slice of the game, complete with the game's core mechanics, a guided tutorial (in single-player mode), and a free play option with map restrictions. StarRupture will be available in PC Early Access on January 6, 2026. The co-op playtest period for StarRupture will be available from December 3 to December 8, and you can request access today (November 24) via the game's Steam page.

#IGN #Gaming
title: StarRupture - Official Co-op Playtest Announcement Trailer
